synopsis.text: Gill's nefarious ambitions of global conquest. Armed with a unique conscience circuit that empowers him to experience genuine emotions and discern right from wrong, Jiro stands as the sole obstacle to Gill's wicked schemes. As Jiro navigates the complexities of his simulated emotions and grapples with the darker elements of the original live-action tokusatsu show, he must safeguard Masaru and Mitsuko, and ultimately determine the true essence of humanity. Prepare for a thrilling journey filled with emotional turmoil, robot battles, and thought-provoking exploration of what it means to be human in this captivating anime adaptation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
